biotools.summary: Tool to deoptimize the RNA or DNA sequences based on codon usage. Codon-pair deoptimization involves increasing the frequency of underrepresented codon pairs without changing codon usage or amino acid sequences.

bioschemas.name: CoDe
bioschemas.summary: Tool to deoptimize the RNA or DNA sequences based on codon usage. Codon-pair deoptimization involves increasing the frequency of underrepresented codon pairs without changing codon usage or amino acid sequences.
